Identity.Name: Wyvern Of Terrindael
Identity.Basic_Description: A orange Wyvern with a curled up tail

Abilities.Name: Flying
Abilities.Ability: This unit can move vertically without spending movement.

Abilities.Name: Fire Breath
Abilities.Ability: Once per turn as an action, place the Fire Funnel template in front of Dragon of Terrindael. All units within the template take 2 distress.

Abilities.Name: Wing Flap
Abilities.Ability: Once per turn as an action, Place the funnel behind Dragon of Terrindael. For each unit in the funnel within a range of 2 move the defending unit to exactly 4 range away from Wyvern of Terrindael. This unit cannot move towards Wyvern Of Terrindael next turn.

Abilities.Name: Tail Whip
Abilities.Ability: Once per turn as an action, Place the funnel behind Dragon of Terrindael. For each unit in the funnel within a range of 2 perform a free attack action. On a successful hit, move the defending unit 2 range directly further away from Wyvern of Terrindael
